title: A Toxic Friendship: Episode 70
content:encoded:
Today our story is from Cumbria in 2012. When one person wants more from a friendship events take a sinister turn with tragic results.

Enjoy the podcast and want more? Listen to 12 bonus episodes plus other exclusive content at www.patreon.com/uktruecrime
